short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to apply font size systems for iOS, Android, and Websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Font Size Generator is a powerful and easy-to-use tool designed for developers and designers to quickly generate font size CSS for various platforms, including iOS, Android, and websites. Simply input your desired font sizes, and the extension will automatically generate the corresponding CSS with the appropriate line heights, font families, and font weights. Additionally, you can download the generated typography data as a JSON file for seamless integration into your projects or hand it off directly to developers for implementation.
